channel.title: PLEASE HELP! - solved now other problem =)
channel.description:
ok problem solved now another problem ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ok so basicly now i get the error- external internal command or some shit like that - please help! i have looked at like 10208923234 vids and its not working ;(((((( !!!
please help!!!!
please help and i will be very greatful :D

item.title: PLEASE HELP! - solved now other problem =)
item.dc:creator: @Rocky2k10 Rocky2k10
item.source: PLEASE HELP! - solved now other problem =)

item.title: PLEASE HELP! - solved now other problem =)
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

That still may not work, if you’re running with Windows 7 or Windows Vista, right click your run.bat and find where it says “java” and change that to " “C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java” "

So here’s what it would look like originally:

@echo off title My Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

And here’s what it would look like updated:

@echo off title My Server "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/bin/java" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
item.source: PLEASE HELP! - solved now other problem =)

item.title: PLEASE HELP! - solved now other problem =)
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

did you download java?if you did it wouldn’t need the pause at the bottom
If your java is working correctly the box would not flash
if it is and you put an pause you might receive some kind of error

Read full topic
item.source: PLEASE HELP! - solved now other problem =)

item.title: PLEASE HELP! - solved now other problem =)
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

right click on run.bat and click edit.

at the bottom, type pause.

@echo off COLOR 08 title My Server client V3 @echo Client Is loading...... @echo ----------------------- java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause

If its the source put pause at the end too.

Read full topic
